original_text:
He breaks me down on every side, and I am gone,
    and my hope has he pulled up like a tree.
korean_text: 사면으로 나를 헐으시니 나는 죽었구나 내 희망을 나무 뽑듯 뽑으시고

sentences.original_text: He breaks me down on every side
and my hope has he pulled up like a tree.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 나의 소망을 나무처럼 뽑아버렸습니다.
